import React from 'react'; import { Link, useParams, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { getBlogBySlug, getRecentBlogs, getPopularBlogs } from './blogData'; const BlogDetails = () => { const { slug } = useParams(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const blog = getBlogBySlug(slug); const recentBlogs = getRecentBlogs(blog?.id, 5); const popularBlogs = getPopularBlogs(blog?.id, 5); const formatDate = (dateString) => { const date = new Date(dateString); return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); }; if (!blog) { return (
